DOC.brief_summary: To determine ability semi‐automated plaque assessment cardiac compute tomography angiography ( CCTA ) high sensitive troponin T ( hsTnT ) risk stratification patient intermediate risk coronary artery disease ( CAD ) .

DOC.criteria: Clinical indication CCTA accord current appropriate use criterion non‐sinus rhythm acute coronary syndrome cardiomyopathy moderate severe valvular disease elevate serum creatinine ( > 1.5 mg/dl ) history ECG sign previous myocardial infarction severe iodine allergy .
